proposal: Greetings, gaming enthusiasts of the SPZ apocalypse! With your innovative in-game economy and a deflationary token model, you've truly set a new standard in the crypto-gaming world. Imagine adding a DEX or a Lottery to your arsenal, powered by your SPZ tokens, enhancing your thriving ecosystem even further. It could be as exciting as surviving in Chernarus, minus the zombies! Congrats on your 79 holders in the BSC network. See my profile for demo and details.
